values: My gecko is in fact a girl. She laid her first egg.

alone, depressed, sick, tired, and with a car alarm that wont shut up.  



happy 2007.

its my dad's birthday today.  he is 60.  so is his twin.  everyone should call him.  

and happy birthday to marissa too.  she is not 60 but she sure as hell looks it.
Bandit died tonight.  Her kidneys failed. She was 15.

Today was Oakland Fire Department day at Fenton's. The guy that Caitlin works for is a firefighter so he hooked us up with an awesome sundae in a fireman's hat. Then he got covered in whipped cream. It was decided that Myrtle, the Fenton's cow, looks like a cracked out version of Mooby the golden calf. See for yourself.
and my underwear is argyle (but only in the front).

Yesterday was a most excellent day.  I woke up and had a twinkie for breakfast.  When I got into work my mentor, Andrew, handed me a huge stack of readings and then said he wouldnt be back in until 3 and I can read those or whatev.  So the work day was as boring as usual but at least I didnt have to hang out with him and play risk.  I hung out at the library and picked up my pay check.  After work, I ate some ice cream and then I went to the beach (even though it was cold and overcast).  Emily and I went swimming and I taught her how to body surf (or at least I tried).  The water was nice because it was warmer than the air but there was way too much sea weed and I kept getting tangled up in it.  Afterwards, I took a shower and when I got out Zaureen and Christina came walking in with a beef and pepperoni pizza.  I was excellent and it only cost $3.99.  After dinner I got to talk to Marni which made me feel elated.  I ended the night by finding out that I can go see the strangers with candy movie next weekend.  YAY!!  Then I snuggled with bunny and fell asleep even though Christina was rambling about more of her life stories.  My she is a loud one.

Things I have learned this weekend:
1.  Giraffes do not like it when you pet them.
2.  The Santa Barbara zoo uses lizards as weed control.
3.  Baby anteaters make a sound like a miniature elephant when they want their mommies.
4.  I like red pandas because they are like a raccoon fox.
5.  Santa Barbara is a lot hotter than Goleta.
6.  Giraffe tongues feel kind of like a mix between horse tongues and cat tongues.
7.  When rock tar gets on your hands it smells like peanut shells.
8.  Mexicans love the zoo.

The End.
I would just like to note that Gil Burkwitz just tried to add me as a friend on the facebook.  REJECTED!!

So yesterday was my last official day of classes.  I think it is stupid that classes are over and i still have to go back to school everyday for random bullshit.  Oh well.  Here is what i still have left for the next week and a half: 1 quantum mechanics worksheet, 4 finals (o-chem, physics, quantum mechanics and women's studies), move out of my old house and into my new one and pack everything into my car.  Then it is time for some road tirppin'.  Going to Texas for a while, home for 3 weeks and then SB for the rest of the summer.  Then back to school and work and all that shit.  Thats the next 4-5 months in a nutshell.  Now you know.

You Are an Irish Coffee

At your best, you are: wild, spontaneous, and outgoing

At your worst, you are: too extreme and reckless

You drink coffee when: you want to keep drinking booze

Your caffeine addiction level: low
What Kind of Coffee Are You?

So this weekend I took my puppy down to my dad's house to let him meet the other doggies.  He'll be staying there for a little while.  I took him to the vet and found out that he is actually only ~7 months old and that he will get a lot bigger (he is already 67 lbs).  Here are some more recent pictures for everybody:















I will be back in town near the end of May and when I get back we should all have a Hank party.  We can take him to the park and feed him cake and pop balloons.  And then he can eat Buttcheecks.
I GOT A PUPPY!!   his name is hank and he is a 9 month old pit bull.  he loves to sit on your foot until it falls asleep and he loves eating grass.  here are some pictures:

so remember that time that we sat on your couch for hours and watched back to back to back to back episodes of the dodgeball tournament?  i remember that day fondly and ever since that day i had secretly wanted to be on a dodgeball team and play in a tournament of my very own.  well yesterday i did.  thats right.  lets go through a little back story.

my cousin rayray died by falling off a rollercoaster and breaking every bone in his body. boop. dead. then, little steph was so distraught about it that she got a job housesitting and moved out.  saturday Lev moved in.  hes the new guy.  very cool dude.  26 fresh outta law school. possibly gay. blah blah blah.  thats the back story.  

now back to the dodgeball story.  so sunday morning we are trying to scrounge together a dodgeball team.  we being me, margaret and caitlin.  we had made shirts already with a picture of mao on them and our team slogan, "mao is my homeboy."  all we needed was two more players.  jenny said she would. and then i asked lev.  i wasnt sure if he was comfortable with us enough yet to trust our ball handling abilities but i thought id give it a shot.  i asked and he agreed to be on the team.  he was super excited about it.  it was awesome.  anywho, then jenny and caitlin both dropped out and we were back to only having 3 players.  we went to school early and heckled some ladies in the gym and they joined our awesome crew.  we went undefeated until he championship game.  let me set the scene.  i was the last one in and they had 4 left.  i knocked out two and then got hit right in the foot.  that was the scene.  we lost but we had a better record so its all good.  after the tournament, lev took me and margaret out for ice cream at the baskin robins.  

i think i am going to keep him.

I feel like today I officially earned my awesomely ghetto oaklander card.  It was a very exciting day.  I woke up.  Poked my drunken housemate and then sat around eating the Chuck Norris birthday cake and the last bit of the Osama birthday cake that Caitlin made last night.  Then I took a shower and went to About Face in Rockridge for a little bit of the stuff they are known for.  I came home and was sad to see that Ryan's ipod was still dead.  I checked the craigslist and found this sketchy dude that was selling a black 60gb video ipod.  I met him in the parking lot of the KFC in Lakeshore he told me the ipod was hot about 5 times and he asked me if I was an undercover cop.  I assured that him i was not a cop and i wrote him a check for the thing.  Then Jenny and I drove around Oakland for a little while blasting the gansta rap from my newly acquired stolen ipod.  It was pretty fuckin sweet.  

I also went to the ACE hardware yesterday and got an illegal copy of a key that said "Do Not Duplicate" on it.  The guy at the store began explaining to me the legal ramifications of making copies of keys that say "Do Not Duplicate" and he was saying all of this while pointing to the sign that said "We do not duplicate 'Do Not Duplicate' keys".  The best part was that he was talking and point and blabbering on while he was still making me a copy of the key.  He didnt even ask what the key want to or if it was even my key.  And it wasnt my key.  It was the key that goes to room 4 in the music building (thats the room that has all the fancy Gamelan ensemble and Kongolese drumming equipment).  Let the theft begin.  Just kidding . . . or am I.  I love the ease of illegality in this city.  Im gonna go boost some car stereos and mug a homeless man.  Ill be back later.  

happy 311 day and happy birthday to the geege!

Klein Sexual Orientation Grid


I scored an average of 1.57

01 2 3 4 5 6
HeterosexualBisexualHomosexual

Meaning

This result can also be related to the Kinsey Scale:

0 = exclusively heterosexual
1 = predominantly heterosexual, incidentally homosexual
2 = predominantly heterosexual, but more than incidentally homosexual
3 = equally heterosexual and homosexual
4 = predominantly homosexual, but more than incidentally heterosexual
5 = predominantly homosexual, incidentally heterosexual
6 = exclusively homosexual

Summary

The idea of this excercise is to understand exactly how dynamic a person's sexual orientation can be, as well as how fluid it can be over a person's lifespan. While a person's number of actual homo/heterosexual encounters may be easy to categorize, their actual orientation may be completely different. Simple labels like "homosexual", "heterosexual", and "bisexual" need not be the only three options available to us.

Take the quiz Jenny said that Mills hasn't gotten her yet. Im straighter than she is. Queer in a year or your money back? HA! I should be getting a refund.

Im surrounded by ninjas but I am a ninja too.  I think they are gonna kick my butt.  Maybe if I keep very still they wont use their ninja skills on me.  I think that works with bears.  Wait, I think they are leaving to take the dog for a walk.

MY UNDERWEAR LOOKS LIKE MY BUTT! 

HOORAY FOR MY BUTT!!!

So I am realizing a lot more these days that no one talks to me.  The people that I used to spend every waking moment with no longer answer their phones when I call them.  I no longer want to play catch up with your life by chasing an internet trail through your myspace/facebook/livejournal friends/AIM away messages.  We all have phones and I am fairly certain that we all know how to use them.  If I remember correctly, there was even a big fight over the break about someone not putting forth any energy to get in touch with her "best buddies".  I am not saying that I am not to blame here too.  Im just as bad when it comes to keeping connections with people. I didn't even know that shannon was in DC right now.  Did you?  
The point is that this right here is the reason why everyone had so much trouble over break.  You cant go for 4 months without talking to someone and expect them to return and have everything be alright.  All im saying is that maybe you should call me.  I think you guys know who you are.

It is finally official.  After a long, frustrating bout with the MySpace authorities I have decided that I am done with their shenanigans.  The MySpace has hereby been deleted.  And now for the softshoe . . . boop boop ba do do boop  

Its a fone with appeal
Now you can have your fone and eat it too
This song drives me BANANAS!!

heres a hint: NO ONE CARES!  you all complain and bitch about the same thing 27 thousand time but i dont think that any of you realize that no one gives a shit.  so shut all your god damn faces and stop your fucking complaining.  thats all.
I got a haircut yesterday.  Now I have the shavies.  THE END!

Dear Santa...

Dear Santa,

This year I've been busy!

In February I got in line at the supermarket at the same time as someone else and I didn't yield (-8 points). In July I had a shoot-out with rival gang lords on the 5 near LA (-76 points). In January on a flight to Bangladesh, I stole the emergency flight information card (-40 points). In May I ate my brussel sprouts (1 points). Last week I set 's puppy on fire (-66 points).

Overall, I've been naughty (-189 points). For Christmas I deserve a spanking!

Sincerely,
dancin_banana21

Well, Shannon doesnt have a puppy so i dont know if ive been bad enough to deserve a spanking, but i kinda want one anyways.

I cannot believe that I am actually awake and somewhat functioning this early in the morning.  I took my final for science and pseudoscience this morning at 9 and when I got to school Jenny pointed out that I didnt even bother to bring a pen.  I ended up writing the last essay with a golf pencil.  Thats finals weekend hotness for ya.  Anywho, I have a physics final tomorrow and an organic chemistry final on Tuesday.  I have two papers that I have to email to my teacher sometime tomorrow but I am not sure that I want to actually do them.  I am pretty sure that tomorrow my friend is having a mid finals weekend drunken orgy party.  I may go to that.  And just think about it . . . ok thats enough thinking Ill just tell you what I wanted you to be thinking.  By this time next week I will asleep in a bed in LA (notice: I never specified that it would be my own bed, just a bed.)  chances are ill wake up half naked in Karny's bed. Im sure you guys would like that way too much.  Oh well, as long as I have my bunny I can sleep just about anywhere.  mmm . . . sleep.  Oh yeah that reminds me.  Lately Ive been going nocturnal.  Yesterday I didnt wake up until 2 and I didnt get out of bed until 3:15.  The day before that I didnt wake up until 1.  Maybe after finals i will make the full transition to vampire, biting and all.  enough rambling . . .

I have had way too many people ask me what I want for christmas this year so I have made a list.  There isnt much on it but from this short list you should get a good idea of what kind of gifts i want this year.  

Christmas List:

Halo 12
Good Bye, Chunky Rice by Craig Thompson
Teenage Wasteland by Donna Gaines
Nine Inch Nails by Mark Huxley
Elliot Smith and the Big Nothing by Benjamin Nugent

Now I need to figure out what the hell everyone else wants.

December has arrived and with it the rainy season of Oakland.  I love this weather.  You wake up and its raining.  You walk to school in the rain and go to classes in the rain.  You walk home in the rain and do your homework in the rain.  You fall asleep to the soft patter of raindrops on your newly insulated windows.  I think my favorite thing about it being this rainy is taking morning showers.  My hair is wet when I leave my house in the morning and it never dries off.  I love wet hair.  Sometimes I even stick my head in the sink just to wet my hair because it feels so damn good.  My only wish now is that my classes could be outdoors.  I would really like some water proof notebooks and a water proof computer.  I want to be able to sit outside in the rain and still be on my laptop.  The rain forces me to actually do my work inside which i hate.  Doing homework in a computer lab makes me want to grab this computer monitor and throw it through the window.  Maybe even the keyboard too.  I want to be outside right now but I get the feeling that my homework papers wouldnt like that too much.  My new goals in life: invent waterproof notebook paper and waterproof laptops.  Oh December.

So there is a lot to talk about i guess.  lets back track to my last update.  I saw veruca salt.  they were pretty bad ass and i was pretty into it.  i am bummed out about my friends back home being losers and not seeing veruca salt at the key club.  apparently they all had to go see harry potter or some shit like that.  (like harry is better then veruca.  i dont think so)  I got invited to a showing of harry potter the day that it came out.  he bought me dinner and i didnt have to pay for the movie ticket.  pretty damn sweet, i know.  last weekend i went with caitlin to petaluma and she got 2 new tattoos.  i wanted to get my ears pierced but the piercer was a douche.  he told me that i was wasting his time and my own money and that i should just go get it done at the mall.  what a douche.  DOUCHE!  anywho.  went al that way just to see caitlin's collar bones.  it was still worth it.  fast forward to this weekend.  

wwwwoooooooosssshhhhhh! (that is the sound of fast forwarding while spinning around really fast)

i would have to say that this weekend was only worth the drive because i got pie.  by the way, pauline's frozen pie thawed on the way home and leaked pumpkin juice all over the back seat of nikki's car.  oops.  anywho, hypatia left her hat at my house on wednesday along with a whole case of beer.  that makes it mine now.  if only i liked beer.  damn taste buds.  took 2 trips to the bevmo and still didnt get anything for myself.  what was i thinking?  oh well.  im sure that in 2 weeks there will be more chances to get stuff from the bevmo.  left my giant cookie goodness and that last slice of awesome pizza in my fridge in LA.  kind of a bummer.  wishing i could type in somewhat coherent sentences.  blah.  i liked the party at my house that just randomly emerged on saturday.  that was kind of nice.  we should do more of that only without all those lube comments from my dad. that man is out of line.  

but now i get to what marni wants to know.  well marni, you want to know if ryan and i had sex this weekend.  here are some things to consider:
--we did spend 77 hours together where the only breaks were for showers and taking poos
--my sexual experiences/ his sexual experiences
--we were both sober all weekend
--your aunt and uncle were in my room all weekend
--we have only been dating for like 3 weeks or so
now you can come to your own conclusions about what happened this weekend.  if you still want to know . . . ask someone else

would you rather:
have to type everything while wearing mittens
 -- OR --
be marni

things to consider:
writing a paper for class, chatting on the aim, being half a karny (or just any part of a karny in general)

So now that I have officially come down from my cookie and chorizo high I have become sane enough to attempt an update.  I am pretty excited right now because tonight I am going to San Fran to see Veruca Salt.  I think I am more excited about it only being $15 and actually being at an all ages club.  WOOH!  I know that you are all jealous right now but no worries for those of you back home.  You can go see them too.  They are playing at the Key Club on Friday.  GO THERE!  All of you.  Then we can all take notes and have a mass comparison of the two shows.  I think this officially makes me a huge dork.  Oh well.  I know you love it.  peace out.

So more than a few occasions Jenny and I have been pleasantly awoken by the smell of chorizo.  We'll get up and get all excited about the presence of questionable meat in our kitchen.  Then we open the door to find that it is Adrianne making soyrizo.  Thats right SOYRIZO.  Thats soy that has been seasoned and formed to look like chorizo.  YUCK!  For the past month or so I have been craving chorizo and this has just been cruel and unusual treatment.  So, Jenny and I finally got off of our lazy asses and went to Safeway where we bought some of our very own chorizo.  This morning (or I guess it was actually afternoon) Jenny and I decided to have a chorizo party.  At first we thought that we should rub it all over our bodies and dance naked in the streets but that could have gotten us arrested.  So, instead we cooked it with some eggs and we made chorizo and egg tacos (only mine was really a burrito).  For about an hour (both before and after eating the chorizo) I had a happy dance going.  I'd actually like to call it a "i got chorizo" dance.  Why is questionable meat from a nearly unknown origin so amazingly good.

(note: chorizo is made up of pig salivary glands, lymph nodes, tongue, cheeks and fat.  basically its pig face.  mmm pig face.)

So I was checking out the facebook and I saw this new this about pictures.  The I was even more surprised to find pictures of myself on the facebook.  I didnt expect to see pictures of myself on the internet today.  oh that crazy facebook.  oh that crazy internet.
well i am pretty sure that word has spread already.  there is no need for me to say anything more and if you don't know im sure you will figure it out in a couple of weeks or so.

so i really have no idea what i am writing about.  i just thought that i hadnt updated in a while so i might as well.  maybe this is a sign that i need a life.  perhaps.  so i have a few new goals that i need to accomplish before the end of the year.  they are as follows:

  1. meet new people that arnt lame and that my housemates like
  2. finally get paid for work
  3. buy new shoes that dont have holes in the soles and that arnt torn
  4. get drunk with ryan
  5. sleep with raffi
  6. piss off everyone that i dont like
  7. finally go to one of Liz's parties
  8. get a new sweatshirt that doesnt have torn sleeves
  9. delete my myspace
  10. delete my facebook
  11. study for o-chem
  12. cut my hair
  13. go blonde
  14. go back to brown
  15. get my car fixed
  16. get my shit together in general

THE END!

lets do it . . . lets talk about how much i rule.  in fact, i think you should all call me and tell me how i am so much better than you.  I am the only one from home that has seen hypatia in nearly a year and not only have i seen her but i have seen her twice, slept at her place and hung out twice with her girlfriend.  we were an unstoppable duo at a halloween party (i was wayne and she was garth and jenny kind of looked like stacy) and I got to watch her spider eat a cricket.  so slap to all y'all. *slap* I WIN!

Hey there to everyone that reads this crap.  I thought a little update might be kind of nice for all of y'all.  Lately I have been on this kick to find new friends that dont go to Mills.  I want to meet more people that live outside of the Mills social network and preferably arnt female because we all know that I get enough of those.  Thus far I have only met 2 people and one was a really creepy 40 year old man that was way too eager to meet.  The other seems cool enough but I wont go into details now.  I am excited about making a few new friends and I am feeling pretty good about myself right now.  Tomorrow is the last soccer game of the season and we will probably get our asses kicked but afterwords I get to go party with Hypatia (and Jenny does too).  Im excited because she is going to be Garth and I am going to be Wayne.  Arnt we the coolest.  I still want to be Marilyn for halloween but at this point I have kind of given up on it for this year.  Perhaps next year when I have more money and a white dress.  I dont feel so injured anymore but I am totally getting sick but thats cool because I would rather had a cold than a gimped walk.  Things seem like they are going pretty well and now that soccer is done I can spend more time actually doing homework and hanging out with friends.  Im pretty excited about life right now.  I think I am coming down to LA around thanksgiving so maybe Ill get to hang out with y'all then.  Im gonna go crash now.  (God dammit Jenny has me using "y'all" stupid texans)

So I have a huge organic chemistry midterm tomorrow and I really dont feel like studying so I thought I would update.  I have really mixed feelings about life right now.  Take for example soccer season:  I have two games and one practice left.  I am sad that the season will be over soon but at the same time I am really looking forward to getting enough sleep and letting my body not be broken.  I hurt a lot right now but in the back of my head there is this voice saying "suck it up. theres only 4 days left and then you can be a wimp."  I have had people around me tell me that what I do to my body is harmful so why dont I ever listen.  If in 19+ years of experience I have learned only one thing it is this: The things you love the most will always hurt you and when you love them back, you let them.  Its as simple as that.  I think that is where all of this mixed feeling business comes from.  Time to go back to being emotionless.  Oh Apathy, how I love thee.
Whats this?  Two postings in one day? From Stephanie?  Thats right.  I thought it post worthy to announce that there is a NEW TEEN GIRL SQUAD!  Go there now www.homestarrunner.com

So this morning I remembered the main reason why I live up here.  Basically I woke up and didn't want to get out of bed because it was ridiculously cold.  I finally forced myself to get up and do something because Caitlin was making way too much noise.  I ate breakfast and got dressed.  I had the intentions of sitting around for a while and then driving to school.  Then, I walked outside and say the giant, dense layer of fog.  Seeing the lovely mist over all of the cars inspired me to walk to school.  So I did (no big feat since I live all of 4 blocks away).  It was pretty damn refreshing and an awesome way to start my day.  I had forgotten how much i love the fog.  anywho . . . that wasnt meant to be the focus of today's entry.

The rest of today's entry will be about the amazing dance parties that will be going on at my house this semester:
  The first party is going to be a drunken naked pizza dance party.  This basically means that the 6 of us are going to get slobbering drunk and dance around naked.  Then we are going to call for the "man fuel" pizza.  When that delivery man comes to the door we are going to open the door (still dancing and naked) and pull him inside to join us.  
  The second dance party will be the one that makes us enough money to pay rent for ever and not have to work.  For this one we are only inviting people with epilepsy.  Thats right, epilepsy.  The plan is get close to a dozen of them, put them in our living room, turn on the black light and start taping.  Hopefully they will all have fits and with the black light it will look like a really awesome rave.  Then we will spray them down with a hose and sell copies ont he internet.  It seems pretty failsafe.  We are gonna make millions.

Also . . . here is what I learned today.  Africa is a soft, fluffy pastry.  It has a yummy crunchy candy topping but the cream filling is really gross.  ITS OVER!

So I have finally joined the cult that is myspace and I am glad to see that it took my friends all of 2 minutes to find me and add me.  (if you havnt added me . . . do it right now before i bite your face off!)  I just figured out how to load pictures onto the myspace so you might want to go check those out.  They are a couple of old ones from last year or the year before but I think they are worth posting.  Im a little distracted right know because the other steph is taking off her bra and feeling up my forehead (which she says is actually more like a 2 head because it is so little).  DO IT!  (oh yeah and I just figured out how to put hyperlinks into my lj also; things are about to get really exciting on the net.)

Oh yeah and a preemptive "fuck you" and "shut the hell up" to Ryan because I know he is going to tell me that I failed him for getting a myspace.

so i had about the 10 thousandth person tell me that i should get a myspace today.  perhaps i will some day.  i also decided that im not going to come down for halloween.  i think i am just going to go up and visit hypatia that weekend because go north to get her, going to LA, back to chico and then back to oakland is probably more driving than my car can handle.  so ill see you all when ever i see you and until then have a fun halloween.  and i wont be marylin because there wont be any james dean.

oh yeah and look at what ive done:
click here

So I am sitting in my english class right now and I felt the need to update.  This class is a little ridiculous but not as ridiculous as science and pseudoscience.  I no longer feel the need to talk about how shitty my weekend was.  If I havnt told you about it dont worry, you will hear all about eventually.  I am slowly climbing out of the shit hole that i got stuck in.  This morning I got a new window put in and I think that this weekend I am going to go over to an electronics store and look at car stereos.  I am enrolling in this government program that will allow the government to pay me to get my car fixed enough to pass a smog check.  My knee is swollen but it will go away.  I think that for halloween I am going to dye my hair blond and be marilyn monroe.  I should start getting paid for my job soon.  I have also completed almost all of my transfer applications and i am hoping that by next fall I wont be going to this ridiculous school anymore.  I want to go to a real college.

So Mike left a couple hours ago and I am surprised that he only left one thing at my house.  This weekend went awesomely.  We had a very relaxing time and I am really glad that he came up.  This weekend was exactly what I needed to de-stress before midterms start.  I was really glad that he was here when all of this shit went down with one of my housemates because afterwards he sat next to me playing some very soothing guitar.  Sometimes I forget just how amazing he can be.  I think I should go do some homework and eat dinner now.  Then maybe I'll watch some tv and go to bed.

So today I decided to skip my first class.  Now I feel like a real college student.  I should probably be working on my o-chem lab but i dont really feel like doing it yet.  I am pretty amped about this weekend.  Friday is convocation so all classes are canceled.  I have an away game friday afternoon and by the time i get home Mike should be here.  YAY!  I am a little bit bummed that the game is so late because that means that I cant go to the Toast Machine show at the Phoenix.  kind of a bummer but i think i can deal with it because ive seen them like 4 times already and i dont have enough money for the show and bridge toll.  I think on Saturday Ill take Mike over to Fisherman's Wharf and we can get some clam chowder.  Yummy $2 chowder in a bread bowl.  I cant wait.  I should probably go do a little bit of grocery shopping so he doesnt eat all of my food.

Alas, I hath decreeded that the livejournal shalt be changed.  New theme colors were needed.  I decided that my livejournal needed to match my bed theme.  Im all about the white, black, red and grey.  Look everybody I am branching out into colors.  ITS AMAZING!  THE COLOR!  OOOH!  
and thus was my decree . . .

So this weekend was pretty fucking awesome.  Friday went really well when the mills cyclone soccer team won their first game of the season (it was 7-0).  And then i went home and realized just how crazy my mother had become.  So get this, I come home friday night pretty late and find that the only piece of furniture left in my room was my bed and that all of my shit was in boxes.  That was pretty exciting.  So Friday night Mike spent the night and I was really surprised that my dad asked me not only "why is mike sleeping on the floor instead of being in your bed?" but also "dont you guys want the door closed?"  I was shocked because I have always lived under the rule that i am not aloud to be with a boy in my room with the door closed.  Needless to say I was pretty excited about it.  Then on Saturday my dad made a really great breakfast for me, mike, jenny and my brother and then we went to san bernardino for the inland invasion 2005.  I was pretty rockin.  We got there while the bravery was playing and luckily for us they got their asses off the stage right as we got to the lawn.  Then, the arcade fire came on and i pretty much had the most orgasmic one person dance party of my life.  They rocked it.  Then Live came out and i sat down (and i surprised myself with the knowledge of their lyrics "her placenta falls to the floor"? what the fuck is that?)  Anywho, post christian rock there was Garbage and Jenny and I both decided that if we were gay we would both want to hit it with Shirley Manson.  She was pretty god damn hot.  After that was Jet who pretty much put me to sleep.  There was another dance party when Madness came out because they were pretty much the definition of skapunkrastafunk.  311 was pretty cool but oddly enough there was moshing.  Right because when i think 311 i think mosh pit.  Beck came out after that and he was pretty awesome.  These guys came out with a kitchen table and some dishware and started playing the dishware with spoons and knives.  There was also this random guy That was pretty sweet.  Then weezer came out and they were pretty predictable so I wasnt really feeling it.  Oasis came out and as much as i love Oasis they could have been a lot better.  They wernt that excited to be there so i kinda wasnt that excited to watch them.  Then Cake finished the whole show and I remembered just why I love them.  Oh yeah its because they rock.  The whole time they were on stage the lead singer was bitching about randomness and talking about how they arnt professional because they dont have a playlist.  Then he started taking band member requests and audience requests.  That was pretty cool.  Then i got back home and mike spent the night again.  then on sunday i went out to breakfast with jenny, marni and kimi.  That was some pretty good eatin for 5 bucks.  Then i got home pretty late and did some homework.  Good times all around.  Oh yeah and I have a car now.  HOORAY!  Now that I have realized that I have no concept of paragraphs or sentence structure I think ill go do homework.  Oh yeah and good news . . . I have internet at my house now.  HOORAY! HOORAY! HOORAY!

So today I devoted my time to doing a bunch of random shit.  Stephanie woke me up this morning to go to the farmers market in Montclair.  Basically it is a place where a bunch of random farmers sell their organic produce for pretty damn cheap.  While we were there we ran in to our soccer coach and the volleyball coach.  They congratulated us on buying healthy organic foods and I felt special.  Stephanie and I also talked to a baker who was there and he convinced us to buy this triple chocolate raspberry cake.  It was really expensive but the orgasm was well worth it.  

After that I went with Jenny, Caitlin, Stephanie and her grandma to church over near Lake Merritt.  We ended up getting there late and had to stand in the back.  Almost the whole time I was standing next to this row of short columns that had on them large glass bottles of colored liquids and I kept losing my balance and falling into the columns.  I had this huge fear that I would push over one column and all of the glass would shatter spilling the sacred oils everywhere.  Luckily I convinced Jenny to switch places with me and then Caitlin rubbed my thigh for a while.  Oh yeah, and I should probably mention that this was a very gay church so no one really cared that Caitlin was caressing my thigh while my hand was in her pocket.  I also decided that the next time I walk into a church I should yell "God is dead and Satan will reign supreme forever" in latin and then projectile vomit pea soup onto the crucifix.  That would be fun.

So, after church we went to china town in San Francisco for the moon festival.  There were a ton of food stands that were there only for the purpose of handing out free samples.  That was pretty sweet.  The streets were really fucking crowded and the shops were pretty shitty but it was fun anyways.  After we left we stopped at the East Bay Vivarium in Berkeley which is my favorite reptile place ever.  I stared and some snakes, bought some crickets and then went home.

When I got home I made dinner for everyone because it was my turn to make the house hold sunday dinner.  I made pasta with a chunky vegetarian marinara sauce, italian sausages stuffed with sun-dried tomatoes and a spinach salad with feta cheese, tomatoes and cucumber.  (I really should learn to tell the difference between cucumber and zucchini)  Then we all ate the orgasmic chocolate cake from the farmer's market and spent the rest of the evening cleaning the house.  Good times all around I'd say.

All in all I would say that this was my most productive non school day that I have had since I have come back up here.  This is how every sunday should be (only the religion doesnt need to be there).

So I got back from Portland on Saturday and right now I am pretty surprised that I am not sore at all from playing 2 whole games.  I am sore, however, from Caitlin.  I made a crack about her mom's face liking the head of my penis so she pulled me off the couch and jumped on my back.  There was a cracking sound and after assessing the damages I realized that totally cracked one of my ribs.  What a sasquatch!  How much of a fat ass do you have to be to crack someone's rib?  God damn woman!  So anywho, the soccer team lost both of the games in portland by a lot but I think that we played pretty well considering the number of girls on our team that dont even know how to take a kick off or where the left defender is supposed to be.  All in all i would have to say that I had a pretty fun time in oregon especially with the free 1/2 pound hotdogs and the super cheap, on sale, tax free shopping.  I might have to go back there on a winter or summer break road trip with the dude.  That'll be great.  I should start planning that now.

      C-O-N-D-O-M! whats that spelL? CONDOM! whats that mean? DEFENSE!

so im back at school again and I have finally gotten everything unpacked and put away.  i had my first day of class yesterday and i think that i will either have a whole lot of fun or the classes will kill me.  either way, we are in for a smashing good time.  im excited because saturday night i get to go see hypatia. shannon and i are going up to chico with a couple of shannons friends and we are going to kidnap hypatia and force her to hang out with us.  it gonna be great.  anywho, we dont have internet at my house yet but it should be here by the end of the month so then i will start updating regularly again.  right now i am using a neighbors wireless connection to do my biddings.  muahahamuahahaha!  well i just got out of the shower and i should really get dressed before my class starts because going to the first class in a bath robe and towel sounds fun but oakland is cold so id rather have pants.  speaking of pants, i think ill go wake up shannon with a kick in the pants.
